entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
